about_the_game:
David Hill, a dedicated police officer who places his family above all else, finds his life—and theirs—irrevocably changed after the events of August 13th. One fateful night, David makes a sacrifice for his family that forces him to confront his own morals. The line between right and wrong blurs as his loyalty to his family collides with the horrors committed.

Now, one month later, David returns to the night shift, working alone. Haunted by guilt and the weight of his actions, he must face the aftermath of that fateful night and the toll it has taken on him and those he loves.

Immerse yourself in a chilling narrative filled with tense moments, eerie environments, and a haunting atmosphere. For Her delivers a gripping and emotional journey, pulling you deeper into David's unraveling reality.

short_description: For Her is a single-player, story-driven psychological horror game that delves into the depths of morality, sacrifice, and the human psyche. You play as David Hill, a dedicated police officer in Dismas City. A loving husband and father, David always puts his family first, no matter the cost.
